title: 🛋 "Not everything that is faced can be changed, but nothing can be changed until it is faced." - James Baldwin
content:
is a variation of last week’s: Write a function that draws an ASCII art cube of given height x.

Example:

$ drawCube(2)
  +----+
 /    /|
+----+ |
|    | +
|    |/
+----+

$ drawCube(4)

   +--------+
  /        /|
 /        / |
+--------+  |
|        |  |
|        |  +
|        | /
|        |/
+--------+
